notes: Stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal and with itself.
Cannot lifesteal off of wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt
params: Lifesteal particles are visible on illusions, but they do not gain health from their attacks.

name: Morbid Mask
description: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
trivia: In DotA, this item was called Mask of Death.
